data.\"PerlBean\": my code generates fully documented general purpose bean
data.description: Code generation for bean like Perl modules
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
First, I've already uploaded "CodeGen::PerlBean" to PAUSE (action
    speaks louder than words).

    "CodeGen" stands for generic code generation, which is what I have
    done with "CodeGen::PerlBean". I haven't seen code generation
    modules yet on CPAN.

    "PerlBean": my code generates fully documented general purpose bean
    like Perl modules.
